name: Coins Pirates: Match 3
description:
Best Match 3 Game Ever!

- Collect all the Pirate Coins! YOH-HO-HO!
- Reach the Super Mode!
- Get all the Mega Bonuses!
- Challenge your Friends!
- Train your wits and enjoy the game at the same time!

Important:
- Select more coins of the same color to get more points.
- Clear the field from all coins to activate Super Game!

Join us for more free games:
